name: Forgotten (itch) (Dan Keefe)
description:
Forgotten

You are a slime amongst ruins; scavenge, explore, adventure, but remember that there is nothing beyond the void.

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space bar for advancing menus
  • M to mute/unmute
Scope

There are currently 10 levels available for the game; I might add more in the future.

It is possible to complete the game ("win" isn't really the right word). For an extra challenge, collect all the coins along the way.

Credits
  • Designed and developed by Dan Keefe
  • Graphics by Safwyl
  • Sound by GroovyMaster & Sauer2
